= Programming Environment =
As programming environment Atmel Studio was chosen due to its integration and comprehensive solution. Out of the box user receives IDE, cross-compiler (avr-gcc), device programming tooling and more. Functionality may also be enhanced with Atmel Gallery (plug-in like extension platform).

== Atmel Studio ==
Latest version available on Atmel's site [http://www.atmel.com/tools/ATMELSTUDIO.aspx AtmelStudio].


= Microcontroller =
To satisfy project needs AVR XMEGA uC was chosen as a primary device to run real-time applications.
XMEGA family detailed description can be found [http://www.atmel.com/products/microcontrollers/avr/avr_xmega.aspx?tab=documents here].

== D Series ==
System blocks are targetted on D4 series MCU and ATxmega32D4 specifically.
More information can be found here: [http://www.atmel.com/devices/ATXMEGA32D4.aspx 32D4].

D4 offers enough processing power and internal interfaces and peripherals to run applications with specific tasks.
